QuestData.Title: Hidden Threads
QuestData.Description: You have kept our mission a secret, and for that I thank you. Knowledge of the timeways, when in the wrong hands, can cause catastrophic devastation. My flight has little power to repair it, now. We must be careful.$b$bThe hourglass grows in power. I believe it can now be used to see much further than before. I wish you to push it to its limits.$b$bReturn to the Siege of Orgrimmar, and focus the hourglass on the most devastating timeway you can find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Vision of Time in the Siege of Orgrimmar.
